pageContext.claim: “We are so proud of the economy; the economy was going down [under Obama]. Had the Democrats gotten in instead of being up four point two, I think you would have been down four point two. That's how bad it was going. You understand that Chris, it was going totally in the wrong direction.”
pageContext.analysis: When Trump was elected, the economy already was doing well, with the unemployment rate falling and the stock market rising. The trends were likely to have continued under a Democratic administration, and Trump has no basis to claim that the economy would have suddenly reversed course.
